entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is trying to find a hidden place.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is accompanying him on his quest.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends who tries to use the spell 'Accio' to retrieve an object.

entities.name: Draco Malfoy
entities.description: A character from the story who had previously mended the Vanish Cabinet.

entities.name: the Diadem
entities.description: An object that Hermione tries to retrieve using the spell 'Accio'.

entities.name: the Vanish Cabinet
entities.description: A magical cabinet that was mended by Draco Malfoy.

entities.name: the vault
entities.description: A location mentioned in the story where Hermione's spell 'Accio' seems to have failed.

entities.name: the cathedral
entities.description: A large building that is being used as a hidden place by Harry and his friends.

entities.name: the city
entities.description: A location with the appearance of a city, built inside the cathedral.

relationships.description: Harry is searching for the Diadem.
Hermione tries to retrieve the Diadem using the spell 'Accio'.
Draco Malfoy had previously mended the Vanish Cabinet.
Harry and his friends are inside the cathedral.
Hermione's spell 'Accio' failed to retrieve an object from the vault.
